level.heading: Personal debt liability; priority; collection; "person" defined.
Legislative History of Law 6-212
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 6-212, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 47-1521.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Section 410(e) of D.C. Law 13-305 provided: "Section 406(b), (d), (f), (l), (n), (o), (r), (v), (x) through (aa), (cc), (ff), (gg), (ll), (pp), (vv), (ww), (aaa), (ccc), (eee), and (ggg) shall apply as of January 1, 2001."
